pageTitle: rBottomBarStyler : Graphic UI Mods : World of Warcraft AddOns
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (12) - initial release with 4 styles (d1, d2, d3, roth) 001 - fixed bug with default bar value not setting 001-2 - orb health and orb mana func - added functions to move / lock stuff - added locking - added moving Diff 002 - code cleanup, removed tabs - one orb func to create all the orbs Diff 002-2 - added the glows (first version) Diff 003 - added orb click and hover functionality - added health and mana values Diff 004 - added functions to automatically detect the mana coloring on stance/class - added mana orb coloring - added health orb coloring Diff 005 - new Diablo 3 textures - added AION style - all frames are now at strata BACKGROUND Diff 006 - roth layout got the cool angel and demon :p - Diablo 3 layout now can
